name: Super Roboboy's Adventure
description:
Super Roboboy's Adventure is a story of a boy robot whose sweetheart has been kidnapped. So to rescue her, Roboboy must platform his way through 5 levels, and ultimately decide how to get his girl back. But Roboboy can't run and jump very well without his main power source, gold. luckily for him, gold is scattered through out the whole world. But beware, the more gold you have the greedier and more desperate are the bandits robots that will try to steal your gold, so give them a good stomping or maybe sacrifice a little gold to please them. 

This game was inspired by the original Super Mario Bros.

Instructions:

The arrow keys to run and jump.

The R key to restart the level.

The space to throw gold.  

By the way, this is my first try at making a platformer, so the hitboxes and collisions are very janky so beware.  Also, the boss is a little broken.
